headline: Data & Analytics - WW Sales and GTM
about:
Working with a talented team of professionals and partners, I lead the sales strategy and execution for Data & AI at Microsoft.  Microsoft’s Data&AI portfolio spans solutions for the Modernization of customer’s existing data estate, Data platforms for new cloud-native applications, Analytics platforms, and Artificial Intelligence. 

My background: After 4 years in dot-com startups, I joined Microsoft in Brazil in 1999 and moved to Microsoft Corp. in Redmond in 2012, where I run the Strategy and Global Development of our WW Specialist Sales Teams. Moved to France in 2017 to lead MS France Specialist Sales team and back to Redmond in 2020 to focus on our Analytics & AI businesses.

Born in Brazil, I graduated in computer science there and then did my MBA at the Univ. of Pittsburgh.

I love spending time outdoors, travelling with my wife (although not doing any of these lately, of course), cooking (this I have been practicing more), running, snowboarding, and playing with our Labrador Minnie :)

headline: Principal Data and Applied Scientist Manager at Microsoft Cloud and AI
location: New York, New York, United States
about:
Bringing Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) into products. Passionate about making an impact on customers and organizations by solving complex real life problems by harnessing the power of ML at scale.

I've 15 years of broad experience in ML and AI leadership, structuring ML strategies for some of the most challenging problems in modern world across different sectors such as financial services, energy markets, and big tech industry.

I thrive in solving impactful problems using innovation at very large scale. I'm passionate about
- Creating new AI/ML solutions using state of the art science and engineering techniques, and 
- Bringing them to life to provide business value at very large scale using the power of the cloud and other ever-growing computing advances in the industry

One of my strengths is building cross-functional teams and forming collaborations with other leaders to create the best solutions for customers. I actively take effort in mentoring and growing talent, developing leaders in my organization, and empowering them to create growth and impact.

headline: Software Engineer @ Microsoft | Purdue University
about:
Ever since I understood the meaning of the word optimization I have had an ongoing interest in getting the most out of processes and real-life experiences. Whether it is deciding on what algorithm to use in order to solve a complex problem or whether I am choosing the order of the places to visit while vacationing, I am always looking for the best possible alternative. Hand in hand with optimizing systems, I also have a passion for technology and data, which I consider catalysts that help us achieve what all companies are looking for, high efficiency and maximum productivity. 

I am currently a senior at Purdue University studying Industrial Engineering, with a minor in Computer Science, and finding data-driven solutions to real-world problems is my passion. I am looking forward to getting involved in projects and experiences where I can build new skills and better my current ones.

headline: Marketing Strategist, Consumer Expert, DEI Specialist | ARF CultureConnect Podcast Host | 2021 Advertising Week ‘Future Is Female’ Award Recipient
about:
Marketing Strategist, Consumer Expert, and Diversity & Inclusion Specialist with 20+ years experience. 

INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE INCLUDES: Media & Entertainment, Financial Services, CPG, Retail, Food & Beverages, Consumer Electronics, Home Improvement, Telecoms, Travel, Hospitality, QSR, Beauty, Luxury, Healthcare, e-Commerce, and Oil & Gas

Agency of Record (AOR) CLIENT EXPERIENCE INCLUDES: McDonald's USA, McDonald's Italy, P&G EMEA, P&G North America, Samsung Global, Mars/Wrigley North America, and Shell Global

Janelle James is an experienced global marketing strategist, consumer expert,  and diversity & inclusion specialist with a passion for changing the world. Her career spans 20 years, includes multiple marketing disciplines, and has enabled her work to touch over a billion people. She’s currently an SVP at Ipsos where she leads the media and technology sector for qualitative research, designs a wide range of studies for Fortune 500 companies, and consults client partners on everything from consumer and market knowledge to inclusion to marketing plan development.  Janelle enjoys learning about new cultures and has lived in the US, France, Italy, and the UK.  She has also had 3 expatriate assignments and each of those experiences has allowed her to hone her cross-cultural understanding and communication.

http://about.me/janellejames

headline: Engineering & Technology Thought Leader | Empowering the Next Generation of Digital Leaders | ex Fintech | ex IBM
about:
As a devoted father to an amazing daughter, I am constantly reminded of the importance of setting a strong example of dedication, compassion, and excellence in everything I do, and this drives me to strive for nothing less than greatness as a global technology thought leader.

With a career spanning of three decades, I have been fortunate to spearhead some of the most transformative changes in the tech world by leading and scaling global engineering teams and delivering robust systems and products across highly regulated industries. 

At the core of my leadership philosophy lies a people-first approach, and my unwavering commitment to empowering and enabling those around me. I take great satisfaction in mentoring and coaching the next generation of digital leaders by challenging legacy thinking and instilling in them the values of collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning. 

Currently, I'm serving as the Director of Engineering at Google, where leading an hybrid workforce enablement and strategic initiative that leverages the power of cloud to enhance developer  productivity, agility, and efficiency across the company by providing compute on the cloud that is elastic, highly available and secure.

It is an exciting time to be facing the challenges of the future, and further exploring how we, as industry leaders, can continue to add impactful and measurable value and change for the customers, businesses and the communities we serve and represent.


Key Competencies: Engineering | Cloud Computing | Infrastructure and Operations | DevOps | Technical Leadership | People Development | Strategic Planning | Change Management | Agile Methodologies | Project Management | SRE

headline: VP, Human Resources at Epredia (a KKR Portfolio Company) / Member of Chief
about:
Juanita Hendrickson serves as the HR leader for Epredia, (a KKR Portfolio Company). During her 22+ year career, Ms. Hendrickson has held senior leadership roles in the world’s best-known Fortune 300 organizations, including Thermo Fisher Scientific (NYSE: TMO), Baxter (NYSE: BAX), Waste Management  (NYSE: WM), and the German company Merck (MRK.DE). Ms. Hendrickson’s experience includes successful integrations of large and complex acquisitions, including one of the most significant acquisitions, Merck’s $17B acquisition of Sigma-Aldrich in 2015.  

An accomplished public speaker, Ms. Hendrickson is frequently sought to share her expertise on matters related to diversity & inclusion, leadership, talent, culture, and employee engagement. 

Prior to joining Epredia, Ms. Hendrickson led global teams in both business and Human Resource functions, including Corporate Development, Human Resources, and Operations Management. Ms. Hendrickson’s breadth of experience bridges from start-up to mature organizations, pre and post Initial Public Offerings (IPO), and spans a variety of sectors, including the life science, environmental, and software industries.

headline: Digital Transformation and Innovation | Empowering Businesses through Technology
about:
Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I am a dynamic business leader and tech innovator dedicated to driving digital transformation for organizations to achieve sustainable success in the rapidly evolving business landscape.

With a diverse skill set combining business acumen and technical expertise as a Full-Stack Software Engineer, I have a proven track record of leveraging information technology to optimize operations, reduce costs, and exceed client expectations. My success lies in my ability to implement innovative initiatives that drive sales growth, improve team cohesion, and enhance accuracy through robust monitoring procedures.

As a goal-oriented open-source software enthusiast, I thrive on staying ahead of industry trends and incorporating cutting-edge technologies into business strategies. I possess a strong background in managing information systems and delivering actionable business insights that empower decision-makers to make impactful choices.

Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated my ability to reduce company costs, foster team collaboration, and exceed goals while maintaining a client-centric approach. I am driven by the desire to be a positive force in the business world, where I can contribute to shaping the future of organizations through technology-driven solutions.

If you are seeking a results-driven professional who can navigate complex challenges, lead successful digital transformation initiatives, and propel your organization towards sustainable growth, let's connect and explore how we can collaborate to achieve remarkable outcomes.

Let's drive digital transformation together!

about:
Not-for-Profit Accounting and Financial Executive with the ability to forecast and strategically plan the financial future.  Laura has over 28 years management experience, which includes 17 years of CFO experience.  Laura has 21 years broad experience in accounting/finance for not-for-profit and for-profit corporations, which includes complex budgeting, federal and state regulations, GAAP, GAAS, FASB, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Audit, Single Audit (A-133), Sarbanes-Oxley Auditing, General Ledger, payroll, account reconciliation, income tax preparation (S-Corp, LLC, corporate, trust, estate and individual), cash management, cash flow projections, financial forecasting, financial statements, and bank reconciliations.

Specialties: Not-for-profit accounting, financial reporting, financial analysis, budgeting, cash flow, tax preparation, technology analysis and implementation, streamlining processes and efficiency improvements, internal control, and fiscal strategic planning.

headline: Enterprise Healthcare Account Director @ LinkedIn
about:
As an Enterprise Healthcare Account Director at LinkedIn, I leverage my 19+ years of Healthcare Sales experience and  to help improve the quality of life and well-being of people. I partner with over 70 healthcare, government, and large enterprise customers, including Northwestern Medicine, Northshore University Health System, and Rush University Medical Center, to assess their critical response needs and guide them on the best ways to implement B2B and Healthcare Communication strategies.

I also lead and coach multiple account teams and cross-functional partners to drive new and existing business, as well as early renewals, through building credibility and trust with CIOs, IT and Telecom Directors. In addition, I have a strong background in marketing and branding, having developed innovative solutions for clients at large venues to increase brand awareness through social media and digital displays. My mission is to enable care providers worldwide to improve health outcomes with LinkedIn's talent solutions.
